gameModel.gameObjects

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameModel.gameObjects.ImmortalObject
      • gameModel.gameObjects.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BronzeKey, Potion

    public abstract class Item
extends ImmortalObject
    Represents an item in the game. Items can be added to inventory and used.
    Author:
    Jiaheng Wang (wangjiah)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public abstract boolean use(GameObject target)
        Uses this item on given target. Returns true if used successfully
        Parameters:
        target - the target to use the item on
        Returns:
        true if successfully used, false otherwise.

        Returns the image that represents this item in the inventory
